document_data.name: Tukulti
document_data.mainbody: '''Tukulti''' was the ruler of [[Firetrees]] in [[Unther]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Tukulti was a supporter of [[Gilgeam]]. He wanted to become the right hand of the king but he had no chance.
document_data.Personality: Tukulti was an idiot who believed that the rebellion was a minor problem. He envied his fellow Great Lords with good reasons.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], Tukulti was one of the nobles who were on Gilgeam's army when [[Tiamat]] attacked [[Unthalass]]. Tukulti was killed when a rebel soldier impaled him with a [[lance]].
